item.title: 汇丰在新加坡扩建以初创企业为重点的部门，以此推动全球业务发展
item.description: 汇丰银行（HSBC）周三表示，该行已将创新银行业务扩展至新加坡，并承诺在新加坡拨款 15 亿美元，作为向初创公司提供贷款的全球行动的一部分。【原文：HSBC has expanded its innovation banking business to Singapore, pledging to allocate $1.5 billion in the city-state as part of a global push to lend to startup companies, the bank said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 中国发出信号，将在五年计划中取消对电动汽车的补贴
item.description: 中国已发出明确信号，表示愿意停止对电动汽车行业的补贴，因为多年来政府的大力支持助长了电动汽车行业的繁荣，使这个世界第二大经济体陷入严重供过于求的困境，并促使其进军全球汽车市场。【原文：China has sent a clear signal that it is willing to pull the plug on subsidies for its electric vehicle industry after years of big-ticket government support fuelled a boom that has left the world's second-largest economy saddled with vast oversupply, prompting it to push into global car markets.】

item.title: 欧盟高级官员称，欧盟规则不会阻碍电信公司扩大规模
item.description: 欧盟委员会一位高级反垄断官员周三表示，欧盟的兼并规则并不妨碍电信运营商通过收购扩大规模，并驳斥了欧洲业界对监管机构强硬态度的批评。【原文：EU merger rules do not prevent telecoms operators from scaling up through acquisitions, a senior European Commission antitrust official said on Wednesday, rejecting criticism from the European industry about the tough approach by regulators.】

item.title: 卡特彼勒第三季度利润因美国建筑活动疲软和关税而下降
item.description: 受美国建筑活动疲软和特朗普政府征收关税的影响，卡特彼勒周三公布第三季度利润下降。【原文：Caterpillar reported a lower third-quarter profit on Wednesday, hit by weak construction activity in the U.S. and tariffs imposed by the Trump administration.】

item.title: CVS 上调全年业绩预期，计提 57 亿美元医疗诊所减值费用
item.description: 受助于药房收入的增长，CVS Health 周三上调了调整后的年度利润预期，但同时也宣布对包括药房内 MinuteClinics 在内的医疗保健业务减记 57.3 亿美元。【原文：CVS Health raised its annual adjusted profit forecast on Wednesday, aided by improved pharmacy revenues, but also announced a $5.73 billion writedown of healthcare businesses including its in-pharmacy MinuteClinics.】

item.title: Verizon 季度新增用户数和利润均超预期
item.description: 本周三，Verizon 的季度利润和新增无线用户数均超过华尔街预期，原因是围绕近期推出的 iPhone 开展的促销活动帮助这家美国无线服务提供商吸引了更多客户。【原文：Verizon beat Wall Street estimates for quarterly profit and wireless subscriber additions on Wednesday, as promotions around the recent iPhone launches helped the U.S. wireless service provider attract more customers.】

item.title: 印度首席经济顾问：美元稳定币将给全球货币政策带来挑战
item.description: 印度首席经济顾问阿南塔-纳格斯瓦兰（V. Anantha Nageswaran）周三表示，美元稳定币的日益流行将成为明年的一个重要现象，并可能给全球货币政策带来挑战。【原文：The rising popularity of U.S. dollar stablecoins will be an important phenomenon next year and could raise challenges for monetary policy globally, India's Chief Economic Adviser V. Anantha Nageswaran said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 阿根廷要求美国上诉法院推翻 YPF 公司价值 161 亿美元的判决
item.description: 美国上诉法院将于周三审议阿根廷是否必须在十多年前夺取国有石油公司 YPF 的控制权后向投资者支付 161 亿美元。【原文：A U.S. appeals court will on Wednesday consider whether Argentina must pay investors $16.1 billion after seizing control of state-owned oil company YPF more than a decade ago.】

item.title: 赛默飞世尔将以高达 94 亿美元的价格收购临床服务提供商 Clario
item.description: 赛默飞（Thermo Fisher）周三表示，将以高达 94 亿美元的现金和未来付款收购私营数据管理公司 Clario，从而加强这家生命科学公司在数字健康和临床试验研究领域的实力。【原文：Thermo Fisher said on Wednesday it would buy privately held data management company Clario for up to $9.4 billion in cash and future payments, strengthening the life science firm's presence in digital health and clinical trial research.】

item.title: 随着股东投票的临近，埃隆-马斯克 1 万亿美元的薪酬协议引起了工会和其他方面的愤怒
item.description: 特斯拉的批评者希望阻止为首席执行官埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）提出的巨额赔偿，但面临着一场艰苦的斗争。【原文：Tesla critics hope to block the stratospheric compensation proposed for CEO Elon Musk but face an uphill fight.】

item.title: 美国关税给阿迪达斯带来 1.4 亿美元的营业利润损失
item.description: 阿迪达斯首席执行官周三表示，阿迪达斯预计美国的进口关税将对其2025年的营业利润产生1.2亿欧元（1.4亿美元）的直接影响，最大的冲击将出现在第四季度。【原文：Adidas expects U.S. import tariffs to have a direct impact of 120 million euros ($140 million) on its operating profit in 2025, with the largest hit coming in the fourth quarter, its CEO said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 人工智能产品需求强劲，TE Connectivity 预测季度利润可观
item.description: TE Connectivity 周三发布了乐观的第一季度业绩预期，此前该公司以人工智能为重点的产品需求强劲，季度利润超出华尔街预期。【原文：TE Connectivity issued an upbeat first-quarter forecast on Wednesday, after beating Wall Street estimates for quarterly profit aided by strong demand for its artificial intelligence-focused products.】

item.title: Pro 需求强劲，苹果有望提升 iPhone 销量
item.description: 苹果公司周四发布的季度财报预计将显示，即使没有华而不实的人工智能工具，该公司也能引发强劲的 iPhone 升级周期。【原文：Apple's quarterly results on Thursday are expected to show the company can spark a strong iPhone upgrade cycle even without the flashy artificial intelligence tools it has been slow to release, a delay that has dulled its appeal on Wall Street.】

item.title: 科技支出计划将考验股市的人工智能交易
item.description: 本周，正在对人工智能进行大规模投资的美国大型公司更新了支出情况，这可能会对人工智能交易造成冲击，而人工智能交易一直是美股破纪录上涨的主要推动力。【原文：Spending updates this week from U.S. megacap companies that are investing massively in artificial intelligence could jolt the AI trade that has been a primary driver of the record-breaking U.S. stocks rally.】

item.title: 美国贸易战持续发酵，加拿大央行普遍预计将降息
item.description: 加拿大央行几乎肯定会在周三将其关键政策利率下调至 2.25%，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）最近发出的提高关税的威胁增强了人们的预期，即需要降息来帮助刺激需求和支持经济增长。【原文：The Bank of Canada is almost certain to reduce its key policy rate to 2.25% on Wednesday, with President Donald Trump's latest threats of higher tariffs reinforcing expectations that a rate cut would be needed to help spur demand and support growth.】

item.title: 奥特曼吹捧万亿美元人工智能愿景，OpenAI重组以追求规模
item.description: ChatGPT 于 2022 年底向公众发布后不久，OpenAI 首席执行官山姆-奥特曼（Sam Altman）就告诉员工，他们正处于一场新技术革命的风口浪尖。【原文：Soon after ChatGPT was released to the public in late 2022, OpenAI CEO Sam Altman told employees they were on the cusp of a new technological revolution.】

item.title: 标准普尔和纳斯达克指数期货上涨，英伟达在大型科技公司业绩公布前盯住 5 万亿美元大关
item.description: S&P 500 指数和纳斯达克指数期货周三走高，在三家 "华丽七雄 "公司发布财报之前，Nvidia 公司的市值有望突破 5 万亿美元，而且市场普遍预期美联储将降息。【原文：S&P 500 and Nasdaq futures ticked higher on Wednesday, with Nvidia poised to surpass $5 trillion in market value ahead of results from three "Magnificent Seven" companies and the Federal Reserve widely expected to cut interest rates.】

item.title: 日产和奔驰敲响芯片供应危机警钟
item.description: 日产汽车和梅赛德斯-奔驰周三成为最新一批敲响半导体供应紧缩警钟的全球汽车制造商，凸显了荷兰和中国在半导体供应问题上的争执所带来的日益严重的后果。【原文：Nissan Motor and Mercedes-Benz on Wednesday became the latest global automakers to sound the alarm about a deepening semiconductor supply crunch, highlighting the growing fallout from a tussle between the Netherlands and China over】

item.title: 日本住友拟斥资 59 亿美元收购 IT 公司 SCSK
item.description: 日本住友商事公司（Sumitomo Corp）周三表示，将斥资约 8,817 亿日元（58.5 亿美元）将 IT 服务公司 SCSK 转为全资子公司。【原文：Japan's Sumitomo Corp said on Wednesday it would spend about 881.7 billion yen ($5.85 billion) to turn SCSK , an IT service company, into a wholly owned subsidiary.】

item.title: Ifo表示，德国工业芯片短缺加剧
item.description: 德国伊福（Ifo）经济研究所周三表示，受全球稀土元件管制收紧的影响，10 月份德国电子和光学产品制造商的材料短缺问题变得更加严重。【原文：Shortages of materials for German manufacturers of electronic and optical products became more acute in October, driven by a tightening of global controls on rare earth components, the Ifo economic institute said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 欧股收平；财报、美联储利率决议成焦点
item.description: 欧洲股市周三表现平平，投资者在评估一系列企业财报的同时，也在等待美国联邦储备委员会当天晚些时候的利率决定。【原文：European shares were flat on Wednesday, with investors assessing a slew of corporate earnings while awaiting the U.S. Federal Reserve's rate decision later in the day.】

item.title: 在人工智能推动的新一轮涨势中，英伟达的估值接近历史性的 5 万亿美元
item.description: 周三，英伟达（Nvidia）的开盘市值将突破 5 万亿美元，成为首家达到这一里程碑的公司，在此之前，英伟达的强劲涨势已让这家芯片设计公司成为人工智能热潮的核心。【原文：Nvidia was set to open above a $5 trillion market value on Wednesday, becoming the first company to reach the milestone after a powerful rally that has made the chip designer the centerpiece of the artificial intelligence boom.】

item.title: 独家报道消息人士称，沙特计划在巨型项目延期后调整 9,250 亿美元基金的重点
item.description: 一位直接了解该计划的消息人士告诉路透社，沙特阿拉伯正准备将其价值 9250 亿美元的主权财富基金从过去十年主导其发展目标的房地产巨型项目上转移出来。【原文：Saudi Arabia is preparing to shift its $925 billion sovereign wealth fund away from a focus on real estate gigaprojects that have dominated its development goals for the last decade, a source with direct knowledge of the plans told Reuters.】

item.title: 奥托昆普盈利未达预期，将投资 4500 万美元在美国建设试验工厂
item.description: 芬兰不锈钢制造商奥托昆普（Outokumpu）周三公布的第三季度核心利润低于市场预期，并表示将投资4500万美元在美国新建一家试验工厂。【原文：Finnish stainless steel maker Outokumpu reported third-quarter core profit below market expectations on Wednesday and said it was investing $45 million in a new pilot plant in the United States.】

item.title: 德国工程机构警告美国扩大关税将打击过半机械出口
item.description: 德国机械设备制造业联合会（VDMA）周三表示，如果华盛顿在12月扩大关税清单，德国和欧洲出口到美国的机械设备有一半以上可能会受到新关税的冲击，并敦促欧盟重新谈判关税协议。【原文：More than half of German and European machinery exports to the United States could be hit by new tariffs if Washington expands its list in December, Germany's VDMA said on Wednesday, urging the European Union to renegotiate the tariff deal.】

item.title: 美国国家公路交通安全管理局称福特因月光天窗缺陷在美国召回近 17.5 万辆汽车
item.description: 美国国家公路交通安全管理局（U.S. National Highway Traffic Safety Administration）周三表示，福特将在美国召回近17.5万辆汽车，因为这些汽车的月光天窗挡风板可能会脱落。【原文：Ford is recalling nearly 175,000 vehicles in the U.S. as their moonroof wind deflectors could detach, the U.S. National Highway Traffic Safety Administration said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 支付量增加，Adyen收入超出预期
item.description: 由于强劲的零售活动使支付量居高不下，荷兰支付集团 Adyen 周三公布的季度收入超出市场预期，但略微收窄了到 2026 年的财务预测。【原文：Dutch payments group Adyen beat market expectations for quarterly revenue on Wednesday as strong retail activity kept payment volumes high, but slightly narrowed its financial forecast through 2026.】

item.title: OpenAI 首席财务官称微软交易提高了融资效率
item.description: OpenAI 首席财务官萨拉-弗里尔（Sarah Friar）周三在利雅得表示，本周与微软达成的协议使该公司能够继续以更简单的方式筹集资金。【原文：OpenAI's Chief Financial Officer Sarah Friar said in Riyadh on Wednesday that this week's deal with Microsoft allows the company to continue raising capital in a much less complex manner.】

item.title: 日本 NEC 将以 28.9 亿美元收购 CSG 系统公司
item.description: 日本技术集团 NEC 周三表示，将支付约 28.9 亿美元收购美国电信和宽带软件公司 CSG Systems。【原文：Japanese technology group NEC will pay about $2.89 billion to acquire U.S.-based telecoms and broadband software company CSG Systems , it said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 葛兰素史克上调 2025 年销售额预期，原因是特效药增长强劲
item.description: 葛兰素史克周三上调了 2025 年的销售和盈利预期，此前第三季度业绩超出预期，主要得益于其艾滋病和癌症药物两位数的增长。【原文：GSK raised its 2025 sales and earnings expectations on Wednesday after third-quarter results beat forecasts, helped by double-digit growth for its HIV and cancer drugs.】
